features: 【2 Pack Genuine Vhoiu KJ50 Model Air Filters】-🌿 Off-brand filters are inconsistent, unusable, and have a high chance of damaging the air purifier. It is highly recommended to use this officially designated replacement filter element to keep your air purifier working at its best efficiency and to breathe fresher and cleaner air all the time, thank you.

【Compatible with 2 Pack Vhoiu KJ50 Model Purifier】-🌿 Not compatible with other models of machines on the market. Product size: 5.1 x 5.1 x 5.7 Inch. This air filter is only suitable for the air purifier product model KJ50 White+Black (Asin: B0CNP8H7K1/B0CNP7411S) sold in our store. (Official original filter, not suitable for other models)
【2 Pack High-Performance Air Filter】-🌿 High-efficiency H13 Hepa Filter,For Pets, Kitchen Cooking, Smoking, Wildfire to trap 0dors and purify your home.

【True HEPA Material】-🌿 Pre-Filter + True HEPA Filter + Ac tivated Carb0n Filter, more effectively aiding in of airborne particles down to 0.1 microns in size, creating fresh and purified air for you and your family.

【Very Easy To Replace】-🌿 No professional knowledge required, it can be easily replaced in 30 seconds!! No tools required. The KJ50 air purifier has been tested many times and the filter life is about 1500 hours. Suggest replace filters every 3-6 months for optimal performance.

【Best After-Sales Service】-🌿 Our service purpose is to hope that every family can live a happy and happy life in a family with fresh air! If you have any questions or problems with this filter, you can contact us anytime. We will have a professional customer service team to communicate with you!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Only Compatible with Vhoiu KJ50 2 Pack Air Purifiers (Official original filter, not suitable for other models) Only Compatible with Vhoiu KJ50 2 Pack Air Purifiers (Official original filter, not suitable for other models)The Portable compact round air purifier 360° all-round purification air to help you breathe fresh air at home.Vhoiu brand air purifiers and we give you a home with fresh air from nature! !!

Cleaner air, healthier family. Healthy life starts with the use of air purifiers! !! Why choose 2 Pack Vhoiu Air Purifier?——About Vhoiu Vhoiu brand is committed to providing High-Quality Household Products for every family.Vhoiu home air purifier will be a good helper to help you and your family breathe pure and fresh air.Vhoiu’s corporate core values: Integrity, Responsibility, Conscientiousness, Innovation. We want to help you and your family (including your pets) breathe clean air and live a happy and healthy life every day! We provide you with air quality protection with filtered circulation throughout your home space!!That is why we need Vhoiu air purifier to create a healthy and comfortable living environment for our family! !!

2 Pack air purifiers option is warmly prepared to meet customers larger air purifying areas demand, more than double efficiency.2 Pack Vhoiu HEPA air purifiers are perfect for home bedroom, medium room, small rooms, baby room, study, offices desk, living rooms, apartment and dormitory, kitchens and basements, etc.With the High-Efficiency filtration system, 2-Pack air purifiers covers an area up to 600ft² (80m²).Improve the air quality of your living environment in all aspects and enjoy fresh air anytime, anywhere! !!

High-Efficiency Air Purifier for home - 3-stage filtration system.Upgraded 3 in 1 H13 True HEPA Air Filter, Help You Breathe Fresh Air at HomePre Filter: Adsorption and filtration, Pet dander/hair, etc.Air purifier is also called air cleaner, and purifiers.

Filter Replacement Reminder Filter Replacement Reminder If the control panel Filter Button turns Red, the filter must be replaced. After replacing the filter, press and hold the filter button for 3 seconds to reset the filter duration. Open Clockwise Shut the air purifier off and disconnect t the power cord from the electrical outlet. Turn the filter cover clockwise to remove it. Install the new filter Take out the old filter and replace it with a new one. Close Counterclockwise Turn counterclockwise until it locks in place (will not fall off), connect the adapter and it is ready to use.
